home.title: Ala-Too Academic Journal
home.description: We eagerly await your fascinating research!
home.article_title: "Ala-Too Academic Studies" - the way to scientific leadership in the Kyrgyz Republic
home.article: It is noteworthy that in 2020, the impact factor of the scientific journal was 0.171, and by 2021, it increased to 0.210. By the end of 2022, it further rose to 0.421, and the journal continues to maintain its high rating.

forgot_password.text: Forgotten your password? Enter your e-mail address below, and we'll send you an e-mail allowing you to reset it.

about.title1: The way to scientific leadership in the Kyrgyz Republic
about.content1: Ala-Too International University provides young generations not only with high-quality education in English, but also attaches particular importance to scientific activities
about.title2: Status as a leader among scientific publications in the republic
about.content2.1: At the end of 2022, according to the calculation of the scientific metric base of the RSCI, the impact factor of a scientific journal "Ala-Too Academic Studies" has increased to 0.421, making them one of the most significant academic journals in the Kyrgyz Republic.
about.content2.2: This indicator testifies to the high level of quality of scientific research presented in the journal "Alatoo Academic Studies".
about.title3: About the processes of receiving scientific articles:
about.content3.1: Our process of receiving scientific articles involves strict control and cooperation with the authors. Each scientific article is subject to a mandatory check for uniqueness through an anti-plagiarism system and is published only if it meets our requirements.
about.content3.2: Therefore, we strongly recommend that authors strictly follow our requirements before submitting an article for publication in a scientific journal
